## Group Work Task: Data Processing 

### Data - VEGIEHAT Pilot Database


```{r, message = FALSE}

#####remove all list
rm(list=ls())

##### Load library
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

```


Load dataset from github repository


```{r, message = FALSE}
####Path of the file
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaynal83/dsjr/main/data/VEGIEHAT-Pilot-Database.xlsx"

#####Download the file temporarily and read it
temp_file <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")
download.file(url, temp_file, mode = "wb")
vegiehat_raw <- read_excel(temp_file)

vegiehat_raw <- vegiehat_raw %>%
  select("SubmissionId", "SubmissionTime", "UserId", "DistrictName", "UpazilaName", "ItemsToChoose", "Value - Rice", "Value - Flour", "Value - Lentil", "Value - Soybean Oil", "Value - Salt", "Value - Sugar", "Value - Eggs", "Value - Chicken", "Value - Potato", "Value - Eggplant", "Value - Onion", "Value - Green Chilli", "Your Comments" ) %>%
  rename(Comments = "Your Comments")



# View the data
str(vegiehat_raw)

```

Generating time and date variable

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat_raw <- vegiehat_raw %>%
  mutate(SubmissionDateOnly = as.Date(SubmissionTime), 
         SubmissionTimeOnly = format(SubmissionTime, "%H:%M")) %>%
  select(-SubmissionTime, -ItemsToChoose)

head(vegiehat_raw, 10)
```


Reshape data to long format

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat_raw %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("Value"), 
    names_to = "Item",
    values_to = "Price"
  )

head(vegiehat_raw, 10)

```

Separate the items into two separate columns

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat %>%
  separate(Item, into = c("ItemsToChoose1", "ItemsToChoose2"), sep = " - ")

```

Dropping item that has no price

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat %>%
  rename(ItemsToChoose = ItemsToChoose2) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Price)) 
                               
head(vegiehat_raw, 10)
```

Name of the item to assign unit

```{r, message = FALSE}

table(vegiehat$ItemsToChoose)

```

Unit of the purchase option (Either 1 kg / 1L as appropriate)

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat %>%
    mutate(PurchaseUnit = ifelse(ItemsToChoose == "Eggs", "4 piece", 
                                 ifelse(ItemsToChoose == "Soybean Oil", "1L", "1kg")
                                 ) )

```


Keeping only requested variables

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat %>%
  select(SubmissionId, SubmissionDateOnly, SubmissionTimeOnly, UserId, DistrictName, UpazilaName, ItemsToChoose, PurchaseUnit, Price, Comments)

```


Converting DistrictName and UpazilaName to factor variable

```{r, message = FALSE}

vegiehat <- vegiehat %>%
  mutate(DistrictName = as.factor(DistrictName),
         UpazilaName = as.factor(UpazilaName)
         )

```

Keeping only required data file

```{r, message = FALSE}

rm(list = setdiff(ls(), "vegiehat"))

head(vegiehat, 15)
```

Structure of the dataset

```{r, message = FALSE}

str(vegiehat)

```
